summary.span: 報告在 .NET Framework XAML 服務實作的整體 XAML 系統中，XAML 型別的相關資訊。

span.span: Reports information about XAML types as part of the overall XAML system that is implemented in .NET Framework XAML Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在許多應用程式開發介面類別提供 XAML 型別，其中這些報告的概念是類似於特定的 XAML 規格 [MS-XAML] 區段的相關資訊。Many APIs in the class provide information about XAML types, where the concept they report on is similar to particular sections of the XAML specification [MS-XAML]. 是廣泛使用.NET Framework XAML 服務 API 中的 XAML 類型的相關報告資訊。 is used extensively in the .NET Framework XAML Services API for reporting information about a XAML type. 報告的資訊，您可能需要了解將 XAML 類型，若要使用的執行個體，或存取其成員在 XAML 節點資料流，或類似的 XAML 表示法。 reports the information that you might need to know about a XAML type in order to work with an instance or to access its members from a XAML node stream, or a similar XAML representation. 報告是類似於如何在 CLR 類型系統，以及反映類別例如，提供 CLR 型別和其使用方式的相關資訊。Its reporting is similar to how the in the CLR type system, together with reflection classes such as , provide information about a CLR type and its usage. 若要擴充 XAML 類型系統，您可以從衍生。To extend the XAML type system, you can derive from . 若要有效地讓執行，您可能也需要實作。To do so effectively, you might also need to implement a . 讓通用的 XAML 類型系統，才能使用支援您指定的引動過程行為一部分的型別系統。The enables the generalized XAML type system to work with the type system backing that you specify as part of the invocation behavior. 特定的自訂提供減少的 CLR 型別系統，所使用的預設值的相依性行為。The specific custom provides a way to reduce the dependencies on the CLR type system, which are used by the default behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然可指派的型別沒有參考類型的所有功能，您可以使用它的指派。Although the assignable type does not have all the capabilities of the reference type, you can use it for assignment. 例如，您可以使用指派至所有的屬性值的型別相符項目。For example, you can use assignment to make type matches for the values of a property. CLR 型別系統中，在 XAML 中的指派類型的概念是向上轉型的概念類似。The concept of assignable types in XAML is similar to the concept of casting up in the CLR type system. 例如，底下的 CLR 型別系統中，每個型別具有其指派的型別清單中。For example, under a CLR type system, every type has an in its assignable type list. 如果兩個的其中一個所使用的執行個體比較有等於`true`，這個方法沒有傳回特殊不明的模式`true`如果兩個執行個體相等。If one of the two instances that are used for comparison has equal to `true`, this method has a special Unknown mode that returns `true` if the two instances are equivalent. 預設實作會使用 CLR從這個和輸入，並呼叫。The default implementation uses the CLR from for this and the input , and calls . 如果您想要指派的型別不同判斷，覆寫這個方法。Override this method if you want a different determination of assignable types. 傳遞 null`xamlType`沒有擲回例外狀況，且一律會傳回`false`。Passing a null `xamlType` does not throw an exception and always returns `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 是虛擬的而且因此，可以覆寫。 is virtual, and therefore, can be overridden. 覆寫有可能 (不論是否適用於惡意用途或其他) 變更 XAML 類型的指派性，使它不再對齊預期的方式與基礎 CLR 型別的型別轉型行為。The override has the potential (whether for malicious purposes or otherwise) to change the assignability of a XAML type so that it no longer aligns in an expected way with the type-casting behavior of its underlying CLR type. 指派作業和存取的任何安全性關鍵的檢查，請改用基礎 CLR 型別。For any security-critical checks of assignment operations and access, use the underlying CLR type instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由上而下是近似於 XAML 處理器的行為，建立物件圖形時的字眼。Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when creating the object graph. 建置時由上而下，型別會具現化，附加至父代，，然後有其內容設定。When built top-down, a type is instantiated, attached to the parent, and then has its properties set. 由上而下建構可避免多次叫用屬性變更處理常式。Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times. 這類處理 ripples 向上物件圖形和因此，排除多個處理常式呼叫，並提供用於啟動的效能最佳化的物件圖形。Such handling ripples up the object graph and therefore, eliminates the multiple handler calls and provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph. 如果您未使用的預設內部 CLR 反映技巧，呼叫這個屬性可以叫用上覆寫衍生的類別。If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a , calls to this property can invoke overrides on derived classes. 如需傳回值和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱文件這個類型上。For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for on this type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由上而下是近似於 XAML 處理器的行為，會在建立物件圖形時的字眼。Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when it creates the object graph. 建立時由上而下，型別會具現化，附加至父代，並設定其屬性。When built top-down, a type is instantiated, attached to the parent, and has its properties set. 由上而下建構可避免多次叫用屬性變更處理常式。Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times. 這類處理 ripples 向上物件圖形和因此，排除多個處理常式呼叫，並提供用於啟動的效能最佳化的物件圖形。Such handling ripples up the object graph and therefore, eliminates the multiple handler calls and provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph. 可以叫用此方法的呼叫才能。This method can be invoked by calls to . 預設實作會傳回值，根據讀取。The default implementation returns a value based on reading . 它也可以檢查如果屬性不立即的基礎類型上找到的屬性。It can also check for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type. 如果值是無法使用，它會傳回`false`。If a value is unavailable, it returns `false`. 如果您想要覆寫此方法使用不同的邏輯。Override this method if you want to use different logic.
